Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Contracts
Oversight - Department of Education’s Contracting and Procurement Process
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Department of Education’s Contracting and Procurement Process

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to require the Department of Education to adhere to the standards typically followed by other City agencies, as specified in the procurement provisions of the City Charter, when awarding contracts, concessions and franchises.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require the Dept of Education to adhere to the standards typically followed by other City agencies, as specified in the procurement provisions of the City Charter, when awarding contracts, concessions and franchises.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the State Legislature to require the Department of Education to adhere to the standards typically followed by other City agencies, as specified in the procurement provisions of the City Charter, when awarding contracts, concessions and franchises.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Require the Dept of Education to adhere to the standards typically followed by other City agencies, as specified in the procurement provisions of the City Charter, when awarding contracts, concessions and franchises.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: James, Stewart, Nelson, Martinez, Mark-Viverito and Brewer
